creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: warp-face plain weave with vertical stripes in red, black, and green predominately (some pink and white); narrow horizontal bands of supplemental surface weaving in stripes and triangles and wider bands of birds, humans and trees in pinks, purple, green, orange and white
title: Cloth (tzute)
